content: 3 Days Auction for an "Alpen Coin x Coldscam CARD by satochip": 1 normal print (1 of 3) and 1 test print (1 of 2)LOT 11 x Alpen Coin x Coldscam CARD by Satochip 3 cards have been released.1 x Orange Piller loaded with 10k sats STARTING BID: 0.0000 BTC LOT 21 x Alpen Coin x Coldscam CARD by Satochip test print2 test prints have been made.1 x Orange Piller loaded with 10k sats STARTING BID: 0.0000 BTC STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001 BTCBID FORMAT : LOT 1 : 0.0000 BTCEND TIME: FEBRUARY 5th, 2023, 22:00 GENEVA TIMEPayment due in BTC within 24 hours of auction end. I will send the winner the payment addressSNIPE PER LOT: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceEscrow allowed, winner pays fees.Thank you
